archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Technical Governance Board (TGB)
archimate:Principle.documentation: The set of technical experts appointed by the Sovrin Foundation Board of Trustees to oversee the technical design and architecture of Sovrin Infrastructure. The TGB is one of the Sovrin Governing Bodies.

properties.value: (c) 2019 by Sovrin Foundation. This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution- ShareAlike 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
